email_body: I think so in a month or so. Problem now is that there is so much customer buying on any pullbacks and selling on rallies that the market, with such a flat curve, is going nowhere. That will change, but it's going to take a while. I like it eventually. Bill White@ENRON 02/21/2001 05:39 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Re: Don't know about the front 2 months, but gut feel is that april thru oct at approximately 50% seems like something to own (although I hate flat vol curves). What do you think (long, flat, or short)? John Arnold@ECT 14/02/2001 21:59 To: Bill White/NA/Enron@Enron cc: Subject:
